ing: 2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers pumpkin pie filling
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger spiced rum (such as Captain Morgan'sÂ®)
des: "This drink tastes almost like a pumpkin nog, perfect for Thanksgiving!"
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add pumpkin pie filling, spiced rum, half-and-half, milk, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Cover shaker and shake; pour into a martini glass.
